Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.model.board

Class CommonBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.model.board.CommonBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CommonBoard extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the common board of the game. Here we have the decks, and the common board, represented with an array of nodes.
